StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRetrainRequestApprovals]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgUnitID int = 0, @FromDate date.me = null, @ToDate date.me = null, @LastName varchar(15) = null, @FirstName varchar(15) = null, @SSN varchar(9) = null, @Status varchar(15) = null )AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT L.LeadID, RR.RetrainID, Recruit.FirstName as RecruitFirstName, Recruit.LastName as RecruitLastName, Recruit.SSN as RecruitSSN, (ISNULL(rp.Title, '') + ' ' + RP.LastName) as RecruiterName, Status = CASE WHEN RD.Descrip.on = 'Submited' or RD.Descrip.on = 'Returned' THEN 'Pending' ELSE RD.Descrip.on END, RR.DateTimeRetrainRequest as Ini.alDate, RR.DateTimeRetrainRequest as LastDate FROM [dbo].[Lead] L INNER JOIN [dbo].[Retrain] RR on RR.LeadID = L.LeadID INNER JOIN [dbo].[RetrainDecision] RD on RD.RetrainDecisionID = RR.RetrainDecisionID INNER JOIN [dbo].[Recruit] R ON R.RecruitID = L.RecruitID INNER JOIN [dbo].[Person] Recruit ON Recruit.PersonID = R.PersonID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Recruiter] Recruiter ON Recruiter.RecruiterID = L.AssignedRecruiterID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Person] RP ON RP.PersonID = Recruiter.PersonID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON l.AtachedPSRSSID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgHQ ON orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.HQ LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS
WHERE ( orgRSS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR @OrgUnitID = 0) AND (Recruit.FirstName LIKE @FirstName + '%' OR @FirstName IS NULL) AND (Recruit.LastName LIKE @LastName + '%' OR @LastName IS NULL) AND (Recruit.SSN LIKE @SSN OR @SSN IS NULL) AND (RD.RetrainDecisionID != 1) ) dt_retrain_requests WHERE (Status = @Status OR @Status = 'All') AND ( (@FromDate IS NOT NULL AND @ToDate IS NOT NULL AND LastDate BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate) OR (@FromDate IS NOT NULL AND @ToDate IS NULL AND LastDate > @FromDate) OR (@FromDate IS NULL AND @ToDate IS NOT NULL AND LastDate < @ToDate) OR (@ToDate IS NULL AND @FromDate IS NULL) )
